headline: What technologies are more performant for web development than Nginx and PHP?
description:
I would like to know if there is any way to make dynamic websites that perform better than NGINX and PHP, I accept any programming language, even C++

I have tried CGI and C++ but it is extremely slow compared to Apache and PHP. I understand that Node and Python are also slower than PHP.
headline_zh-Hans: 对于Web开发来说，什么技术比Nginx和PHP更具有性能？
headline_zh-Hant: 對於Web開發來說，什麼技術比Nginx和PHP更具有性能？
description_zh-Hans:
我想知道是否有什么方法可以使动态网站的性能比NGINX和PHP更好，我接受任何编程语言，甚至是C++

我已经尝试过CGI和C++，但与Apache和PHP相比，它非常缓慢。据我所知，Node和Python也比PHP慢。
description_zh-Hant:
我想知道是否有什麼方法可以使動態網站的性能比NGINX和PHP更好，我接受任何編程語言，甚至是C++

我已經嘗試過CGI和C++，但與Apache和PHP相比，它非常緩慢。據我所知，Node和Python也比PHP慢。
